title: Wanting to buy Pax Jax
body:
Hello everyone! xd
I've been a Jax jungle main for a while now and I was wondering if there is any possible way for me to get Pax Jax, my most favorite skin in the entire world. If anyone knows a special way to get it leave a message!

Thanks! xd

replies.body:
Unfortunately, PAX Jax was a super limited skin and there's no way to get it anymore. :(

If you have any other questions, please let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zgh62cyd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-20T23:06:49.049+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, PAX Jax was a super limited skin and there's no way to get it anymore. :(
> 
> If you have any other questions, please let me know.

when will the next wave of news, of the assassin rework, come?
